title: Fruit stuffed chicken
directions: Peel and chop garlic and mix with salt, pepper, ginger, a spoon of honey and orange juice.
Spread over chicken, wrap it in foil and put in the fridge.
Wash and dry raisins and apricots.
Peel, clean and cut the apples into quarters.
Peel and clean the oranges, split into parts and remove the seeds.
Cut apricots into stripes, mix with a spoon of honey.
Add 2 chopped apples, 1 orange, orange zest and raisins.
Mix everything and stuff it into the chicken.
Put the chicken into an oven dish, place remaining oranges around it and pour 4 spoons of melted butter.
Cover with foil and put into the oven.
Pour remaining orange juice and bake for 40-50 min in 180C.
Remaining apples mix with sugar, majeranek and cloves.
Remove the foil from the chicken, put the apples around and bake for another 20 minutes.
